name: Rotation Puzzle - AR Cube 3D Controller
description:
To play this game, you need to print and assemble the cube available in the download links. Try to make the cube as sturdy as possible for best performance.

Open the game and give the program permissions to use your computers webcam, then hold the cube in front of the webcam to play the game.

Rotate the cube until you get a 95% match to get a new puzzle.
